name: 運動技術分析
description: Sport is composed of multiple body movements interaction. Sport technique analysis applies the theory of biomechanics and analytical methods to analyze the components of sport techniques, characteristics of sport techniques, sport efficiency, and other factors by using qualitative and quantitative analyses. Based on the results of these analyses, coaches can develop the sport tactics in order to enhance the sport performance. This course comprises the following topics: sport phenomenon exploration, qualitative analysis of sport technique, and quantitative analysis of sport technique.
goals: 了解各項運動技術相關之理論，並能對運動技術進行分析與評論其壞優劣
